content: There are two easy paths to take down to the Brook of Bliss: one right next to the Forest Shrine, and one a bit further up along the main path. Both paths are lined with various Frozen Corpses and likely a Cyan Bat or two hiding up in the trees.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Valley of Ecstasy Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Brook of Bliss'.
The content is as follows:
There are two easy paths to take down to the Brook of Bliss: one right next to the Forest Shrine, and one a bit further up along the main path. Both paths are lined with various Frozen Corpses and likely a Cyan Bat or two hiding up in the trees.
